data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Park Medi World Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 28/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Park Medi World Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 28/01/2026inter alia to consider and approve standalone and consolidated unaudited financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Acquisition Of Krishna Super-Speciality Hospital.
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of Park Medi World Limited in its meeting held today i.e. January 05 2026 has inter alia considered and  approved the acquisition of Krishna Super-speciality Hospital.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Park Medi World Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from December 17 2025 the Equity Shares of Park Medi World Ltd (Scrip Code: 544645) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251216- dated December 16 2025.
